title: RGirlsData
text: package contains datasets teaching purposes RGirls Community. current data available package data ruler drop test reaction time, called reactionData. test uses known properties gravity determine long takes person respond dropping object measuring far object can fall caught. data collected students drinking coke. find bugs, feature requests feedback, please submit issue. download install development version package, use devtools: ‚Äôve installed package, can load library standard way: Basic usage:
code: install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("R-Girls/RGirls-pkg") library(RGirlsData) reactionData  # A tibble: 103 √ó 4    student  test time_before time_after    <chr>   <dbl>       <dbl>      <dbl>  1 Amy         1       0.207      0.163  2 Amy         2       0.221      0.181  3 Amy         3       0.136      0.175  4 Amy         4       0.197      0.15   5 Amy         5       0.111     NA      6 Betty       1       0.3        0.128  7 Betty       2       0.239      0.273  8 Betty       3       0.175      0.217  9 Betty       4       0.26       0.275 10 Carol       1       0.186      0.207 # ‚Ä¶ with 93 more rows # ‚Ñπ Use `print(n = ...)` to see more rows
